content.query:
SELECT 
    TOP 100 ProductID,Name,RowSignature,EffectiveFromDate,EffectiveToDate,IsActive,ProductKey
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synstg.blob.core.windows.net/syn-fs/delta/gold/DimProduct/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
where ProductId<707 order by ProductId,dateinserted desc
